sentences.english: Zhong Zhou sailing Club employed two sailing teachers from Qingdao .

sentences.english: Many of the enterprises are employing leading- post retirement premises Board.

sentences.english: Soon after you make a hiring decision, you’ll want to make an employment offer.

sentences.english: Of course, I‘ll accept your offer. I want to work for you.
